name: Easy Fried Spinach
author: roteir
summary: This is a dish I stumbled across while I was in China and tried to emulate.  Of all my various original recipes, this is the one of my families favorites.  It is simple, requires few ingredients and is easy and fast.
directions: Melt the butter with the canola oil in a large skillet over medium heat until it stops bubbling
This allows the water from the butter to evaporate
Add the garlic; cook and stir for about 2 minutes, until it is just beginning to brown
Put in the spinach leaves and cook for about 5 minutes while stirring, until the leaves are dark and are about 1/4 of their original size
